div.p: Die von Ihnen aufgerufene Funktion der Website konnte leider nicht ausgeführt werden.

div.a: Skip over Site Identifier and Sitemap

div.script: function menuItem_mouseOver(A){var B=A.getElementsByTagName("A");if(!B||B.length===0){jslog.error("Navigation element has no contained link! Element dump:");jslog.debug(B.outerHTML)}else{if((typeof B[0].onmouseover=="undefined")||(B[0].onmouseover==null)){var D=$find("bhvHme");if(D!=null){var B=D.get_element();var C=B.getElementsByTagName("UL");D.initializeList(C);var B=A.getElementsByTagName("A");if(B[0].onmouseover===null){jslog.error("Failed to set mouse over event for left navigation link:");jslog.debug(B.outerHTML)}else{B[0].onmouseover()}}}else{B[0].onmouseover()}}};

div.h3: Alle Siemens Produkte, Lösungen und Services

div.h1: Die von Ihnen aufgerufene Seite konnte nicht gefunden werden.

div.h2: Mögliche Ursachen: 1. Durch die Neugestaltung der www.siemens .de Website kann sich die URL der gewünschten Seite geändert haben oder die Seite wird nicht mehr angeboten. 2. Die in der Adresszeile des Browsers eingegeben URL ist fehlerhaft. Prüfen Sie die korrekte Schreibweise der eingegebenen URL.

div.p: Sie suchen Siemens vor Ort? Hier finden Sie alle deutschen Standorte und Ihren persönlichen Ansprechpartner im Vertrieb.

div.script: var bhvLightboxId="bhvLightbox1";function safariCorrectLightboxCloseButton(){var B=$get("divLightboxContainer");var C=$get("divLightboxClose");var A=B.offsetWidth-C.offsetWidth;C.style.left=""+A+"px";C.style.position="absolute"}function showLightbox(F,C,H,E,B){var A=$find(bhvLightboxId);if(A!=null){var L=document.getElementById("ifrBoxContent");L.src=F;var J=$get("divLightboxContainer");var D=false;if(typeof J.parentElement!="undefined"){J=J.parentElement}else{D=true}if((typeof C!="undefined")&&(C!=null)){jslog.debug("Lightbox link: Setting width to "+C);J.style.width=C;setTimeout("safariCorrectLightboxCloseButton()",500)}else{C=null}if((typeof H!="undefined")&&(H!=null)){jslog.debug("Lightbox link: Setting height to "+H);J.style.height=H}else{H=null}var K=44,N=116;if(((typeof E!="undefined")&&(E!=null))&&((typeof B!="undefined")&&(B!=null))){if((typeof E=="string")||(typeof B=="string")){if(E.indexOf("px")>=0){K=parseInt(E.substring(0,E.indexOf("px")))}else{K=parseInt(E)}if(B.indexOf("px")>=0){N=parseInt(B.substring(0,B.indexOf("px")))}else{N=parseInt(B)}}}jslog.debug("Lightbox link: Move to position ("+K+", "+N+").");J.style.position="absolute";A.set_X(K);A.set_Y(N);A.show();if(D){var M=$get(A._PopupControlID);var I=A._PopupControlID+"_DropShadow";var G=$get(I);if((G==null)||(typeof G=="undefined")){jslog.error("Unable to locate drop shadow for light box.")}else{if((typeof C!="undefined")&&(C!=null)){jslog.debug("Lightbox link: Setting dropShadow width to "+C);G.style.width=C;M.style.width=C;L.style.width=C}if((typeof H!="undefined")&&(H!=null)){jslog.debug("Lightbox link: Setting dropShadow height to "+H);G.style.height=H;M.style.height=H;L.style.height=H}}}if((typeof H!="undefined")&&(H!=null)){L.style.height=H}handleLogoOnShowLightbox(true)}}function closeLightbox(){var A=$find(bhvLightboxId);if(A!=null){A.hide();handleLogoOnShowLightbox(false)}}function handleLogoOnShowLightbox(A){var B=$get("header-zone");if(B!=null){B.style.position=A?"static":"relative"}}function pageLoad(){var A=$find(bhvLightboxId);if(A!=null){A._backgroundElement.onclick=closeLightbox}}function getWindowWidth(){return window.innerWidth!=null?window.innerWidth:document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientWidth?document.documentElement.clientWidth:document.body!=null?document.body.clientWidth:null}function getWindowHeight(){return window.innerHeight!=null?window.innerHeight:document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientHeight?document.documentElement.clientHeight:document.body!=null?document.body.clientHeight:null}function posLeft(){return typeof window.pageXOffset!="undefined"?window.pageXOffset:document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollLeft?document.documentElement.scrollLeft:document.body.scrollLeft?document.body.scrollLeft:0}function posTop(){return typeof window.pageYOffset!="undefined"?window.pageYOffset:document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollTop?document.documentElement.scrollTop:document.body.scrollTop?document.body.scrollTop:0}function posRight(){return posLeft()+getWindowWidth()}function posBottom(){return posTop()+getWindowHeight()};

div.h1: Update current page from HQ site
div.div: If this page is connected to a headquarter (HQ) item via publishing mechanism updates can be pulled manually from the original source. (Updates may not be available instantly.)
Please wait. Checking HQ page link...
Found matching HQ Page: Source Page Title
Unable to find matching HQ page.

form.script: function _rcpLogDebug(A){if((typeof jslog!="undefined")&&(jslog!=null)&&(typeof jslog.debug!="undefined")){jslog.debug("RCP: "+A)}if((typeof console!="undefined")&&(typeof console.log!="undefined")){console.log("RCP: "+A)}}function _rcpUrlIsAbsolute(A){return(A.indexOf("://")>=0)}function _rcpMakeAbsoluteUrl(A,B){if(_rcpUrlIsAbsolute(B)){return B}else{return A+B}}function _rcpRefreshCurrentPage(){}function _rcpEnsureWebUrl(A){if((typeof A=="undefined")||(A==null)||(A.length==0)){return""}var B=A.toLowerCase().indexOf("/pages");if(B>=0){return A.substring(0,B)}else{return A}}function _rcpGenerateCopyUrl(A,B){var C=_rcpEnsureWebUrl(A);C+="/_layouts/Querplex/ExImport/ExportTP.aspx?command=autoexport";C+="&pageurl="+encodeURIComponent(A);C+="&toweburl="+encodeURIComponent(_rcpEnsureWebUrl(B));C+="&setcontent=allways";return C}function _rcpGetCurrentPagesSiteRelativeUrl(){var B=window.location.href.split("?",1)[0];var A=B.toLowerCase().indexOf(rcpgpCurrentWebUrl.toLowerCase());if(A>=0){B=B.subString(A)}else{return B}}function _rcpAutoConnect(A){_rcpLogDebug("Sending connect request.");var B=_rcpGetCurrentPagesSiteRelativeUrl();var C=_rcpPageProperties.objectHistoryId;if((typeof C=="undefined")||(C==null)||(C=="")){_rcpLogDebug("ObjectHistoryId (which is needed for AutoConnect) is missing. Aborting 'adopt'");return}jQuery("#rcpgpConnectProgress").show();var D={Method:"SaveAction",PropertyObjectID:A,ActionStatus:1,NewInSiteRelativeUrl:B,IsWeb:"page",ReConnectOriginalUrl:null};jQuery.ajax({cache:false,type:"POST",url:"JQueryRequest.ashx",data:data,dataType:"json",success:function(E){jQuery("#rcpgpConnectProgress").hide();jQuery("#rcpgpCopyResult").show();_rcpDisableDialogButton("rcpUpdatePageDialog","Update",false)},error:function(F,E,G){jQuery("#rcpgpConnectProgress").hide();_rcpLogDebug("Connect failed.");jQuery("#rcpgpCopyResultFailed").show().html("Connect failed");jQuery("#rcpgpCopyErrorImage").attr("title",G)}})}function _rcpSendCopyRequest(A){_rcpLogDebug("Sending copy request.");_rcpLogDebug("Request url: "+A);jQuery("#rcpgpCopyProgress").show();jQuery.ajax({async:true,cache:false,type:"GET",url:A,data:{},dataType:"xml",success:function(C){jQuery("#rcpgpCopyProgress").hide();if(C.Error==null){_rcpLogDebug("Copy successful");var D=C.text;_rcpLogDebug("Extended copy status: "+D);_rcpAutoConnect();_rcpRefreshCurrentPage()}else{_rcpLogDebug("Problem with QP webservice: Returned success and error. Problem status hidden in error text");_rcpLogDebug("Copy seems to have nonfatal errors");jQuery("#rcpgpCopyResultFailed").show().html("Update failed");var E=C.Error.Message;var B=C.Error.Detail;jQuery("#rcpgpCopyErrorImage").attr("title",E)}},error:function(C,B,D){jQuery("#rcpgpCopyProgress").hide();_rcpLogDebug("Copy failed.");jQuery("#rcpgpCopyResultFailed").show().html("Update failed");jQuery("#rcpgpCopyErrorImage").attr("title",D)}})}function _rcpDisableDialogButton(B,D,A){var C=jQuery("."+B+" .ui-dialog-buttonpane button");for(var F=0;F<C.length;++F){var E=jQuery(C[F]);if(E.text()==D){if(A==true){E.removeAttr("disabled").removeClass("ui-state-disabled")}else{E.attr("disabled","disabled").addClass("ui-state-disabled")}return}}_rcpLogDebug('Unable to disable/enable button "'+D+'" in dialog with css class "'+B+'"')};
